name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
ingredients: 8 oz. angel hair pasta or spaghetti
1/2 cups white wine or chicken broth
instructions: In pan cook pasta as directed on package.
Stir in spinach, tomatoes and 2 t. oil.
While pasta is cooking in 12‚Äù skillet heat 1 t. oil over med high heat.
Add onion; cook and stir 1 minutes.
Add shrimp, garlic and pepper flakes; cook and stir 2 minutes.
Stir in wine broth, salt and pepper; cook 2 minutes until shrimp are pink and firm.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley and butter until melted.
Add shrimp mix to pasta mix; toss to mix.
I used 2 c. spinach and 3/4 c. tomato the first time to cut back on the amount of food.
